wallTitle: Riverside High School Alumni Association Hall of Fame

organization.name: Riverside High School Alumni Association
organization.mission: Celebrate the quality of education and extracurricular experiences at Riverside Local Schools
goals: Renew or continue the friendships among alumni
Honor distinguished alumni through the Hall of Fame
Enhance and preserve the legacy, prestige and traditions of Riverside
Tell Riverside's story through the people who have lived its history
organization.philosophy: The quality of the education we received and the friendships we made make Riverside High School a very special place indeed.

hallOfFame.purpose: Recognize and honor distinguished alumni, faculty, staff, and coaches

membership.eligibility: All alumni, former/current faculty, staff, and community members
membership.governance: Voting members elect board of trustees annually
membership.meetings: Monthly - second Monday at 7pm, or second Saturday at 10:30am in January/February

wallDescription: A digital memorial celebrating the distinguished members of the Riverside High School Hall of Fame, preserving the legacy of excellence in education, athletics, and service to the community.
